titleStmt.title: The art of swimming illustrated by proper figures with advice for bathing / by Monsìeur Thevenot ; done out of French ; to which is prefixed a prefatory discourse concerning artificial swimming, or keeping ones self above water by several small portable engines, in case of danger.
Art de nager. English
titleStmt.author: Thévenot, M. (Melchisédech), 1620?-1692.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Dan Brown ..., D. Midurnter and T. Leigh ..., and Robert Knaplock ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
